name: 7 days to harvest
description:
A game about a common man convicted to harvest fields for his antisocial behavior.

You will ride your Tractor-S Mark5™ through 7 days of harvest, full of unpredictable events and challenges to retain you status of an honorable citizen.

  • Dark an yet ironic setting
  • Tractor-S Mark5™
  • Fresh take on an oldschool arcade classic
  • 7 levels of harvesting mayhem
